## Source: CIBSE TM46:2008 Energy Benchm: ## Notes: Benchmarks are "typical" values for Display Energy Certificates
## Floor area metric: Gross Internal Area (GIA) unless alternate metric specified

column3: General office and commercial working areas
Retail warehouse or other large non-food store
Supermarket or other large food store
Museum art gallery or other public building with normal occupancy
Swimming pool hall changing and ancillaries
Car park with roof and side walls
Light use public and institutional buildings
Public buildings nominally used for part of the year
Bus or train station shopping centre mall
Workshop or open working area not office
